Text: Restless (Carl Perkins song):  The song was recorded on September 27, 1968, and released as a 45 single, 4-44723, on Columbia, in December, 1968, backed with "11-43", reaching no. 20 on the "Billboard" country chart.

Text: Restless (Carl Perkins song):  The recording, produced by Bill Denny and Larry Butler, also appeared on the May, 1969 Columbia LP "Carl Perkins' Greatest Hits".
